Get self-reported non-cancer diagnoses

get_self_report_non_cancer_diagnoses.Rd

Returns a long format dataframe with all self-reported non-cancer diagnoses with associated dates for each UK Biobank participant.

get_self_report_non_cancer_diagnoses(
  ukb_pheno,
  data_dict,
  ukb_codings,
  remove_special_dates = TRUE
)

Arguments

ukb_pheno

a UK Biobank phenotype dataset
data_dict

a data dictionary for ukb_pheno
ukb_codings

The UKB codings dictionary. This should be a data frame where all columns are of type character. By default, this is downloaded from the ukbwranglr_resources github repo.
remove_special_dates

Logical. Remove 'special' date values if requested. Default is TRUE. See data coding 13.

Value

Dataframe

Details

Reformats the data for FieldIDs 20002 and 20008 (self-reported non-cancer diagnoses and dates, see category 100074). Coded using data coding 6.

See also

Other get all diagnostic codes: get_all_diagnostic_codes_multi(), get_cancer_register_icd10_diagnoses(), get_cancer_register_icd9_diagnoses(), get_death_data_icd10_diagnoses(), get_diagnoses_set_index_code_date_cols(), get_hes_icd10_diagnoses(), get_hes_icd9_diagnoses(), get_self_report_cancer_diagnoses(), get_self_report_non_cancer_diagnoses_icd10(), main_dataset_diagnoses_to_sqlite_db()
